Chapter 1

Here’s chapter 1 (translated to Chinese)!

Here is some math: $\mathcal{G} e^ix = \sin(x) + i \cos(x)$

Euler’s identity $e^{i\pi}+1=0$ is a beautiful formula in $\mathbb{2}$.
